metadata.title: Friday, 14th November, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    when the 2013 Constituency Development Fund (CDF) for Rufunsa Parliamentary Constituency will be released;
(b)    what has caused the delay in releasing the money; and
(c)    whether interest will be paid considering the delay in releasing the money in order to pay contractors that have been inconvenienced.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs what progress had been made on the expansion of Nchelenge State Prison as of August, 2014.

Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection when the houses at Kitwe Nursery and Research Centre in Kwacha Parliamentary Constituency will be sold to employees who are sitting tenants.
Minister of Local Government and Housing when a modern bus station will be constructed in Kalabo District.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure):  Committee of Supply. Heads 01/01, 02/01, 02/03, 02/04, 19/01 and 03/01 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 01    -    Office of the President - State House Head 02    -    Office of the Vice President Head 19    -    Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit Head 03    -    National Assembly
